mapper.select: SELECT PRJ.NO FROM TBL_PRJ PRJ JOIN (SELECT * FROM TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS WHERE NO IN (SELECT MAX(NO) AS NO FROM TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS GROUP BY REF_PRJ_NO) ) TPP ON TPP.REF_PRJ_NO = PRJ.NO JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM ON PRJ.REF_MEMBER_NO = TM.NO WHERE TPP.STATUS = 'TEMPORARY' AND TM.ID = '${userId}'

SELECT PRJ.NO AS TBL_PRJ_NO, PRJ.TITLE AS TBL_PRJ_TITLE, PRJ.CONTENT AS TBL_PRJ_CONTENT, PRJ.REGIST_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_REGEIST_DATE, PRJ.START_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_START_DATE, PRJ.END_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_END_DATE, PRJ.TARGET_AMOUNT AS TBL_PRJ_TARGET_AMOUNT, PRJ.CURRENT_AMOUNT AS TBL_PRJ_CURRENT_AMOUNT FROM TBL_PRJ PRJ WHERE PRJ.NO = ${projectNo}

SELECT TP.NO AS TBL_PRODUCT_NO, TP.NAME AS TBL_PRODUCT_NAME, TP.INTRODUCTION AS TBL_PRODUCT_INTRODUCTION, TP.PRICE AS TBL_PRODUCT_PRICE, TP.MAX_QUANTITY AS TBL_PRODUCT_MAX_QUANTITY, TP.STATUS AS TBL_PRODUCT_STATUS, TP.PRODUCT_SIZE AS TBL_PRODUCT_PRODUCT_SIZE FROM TBL_PRODUCT TP JOIN TBL_PRJ_PRODUCT_LIST TPPL ON TPPL.REF_PRODUCT_NO = TP.NO WHERE REF_PRJ_NO = ${projectNo}

SELECT TPF.NO AS TBL_PRJ_FILE_NO, TPF.TYPE AS TBL_PRJ_FILE_TYPE, TPF.ORIGIN_NAME AS TBL_PRJ_FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, TPF.CHANGE_NAME AS TBL_PRJ_FILE_CHANGE_NAME FROM TBL_PRJ_FILE TPF WHERE REF_PRJ_NO = ${projectNo} OR TPF.DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT PRJ.NO AS TBL_PRJ_NO, PRJ.TITLE AS TBL_PRJ_TITLE, PRJ.START_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_START_DATE, PRJ.END_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_END_DATE, PRJ.TARGET_AMOUNT AS TBL_PRJ_TARGET_AMOUNT, TC.NAME AS TBL_CATEGORY_NAME FROM TBL_PRJ PRJ JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM on PRJ.REF_MEMBER_NO = TM.NO JOIN TBL_CATEGORY TC ON PRJ.REF_CATEGORY_NO = TC.NO WHERE PRJ.NO = ${projectNo} -- AND TM.ID = '#{userId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TBL_PRJ PRJ (PRJ.NO, PRJ.TITLE, PRJ.REGIST_DATE, PRJ.START_DATE, PRJ.END_DATE, PRJ.TARGET_AMOUNT, PRJ.REF_MEMBER_NO, PRJ.REF_CATEGORY_NO) VALUES (SEQ_TBL_PRJ_NO.nextval, '${title}', SYSDATE, '${startDate}', '${endDate}',${targetAmount}, 1, ${category.no})
SELECT SEQ_TBL_PRJ_NO.currval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS TPP (TPP.NO, TPP.REGIST_DATE, TPP.STATUS, TPP.REF_PRJ_NO) VALUES (SEQ_TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS_NO.nextval, SYSDATE, '${projectProgress.status}', #{no})

INSERT INTO TBL_PRODUCT TP (TP.NO, TP.NAME, TP.INTRODUCTION, TP.PRICE, TP.MAX_QUANTITY, TP.STATUS, TP.PRODUCT_SIZE) VALUES (SEQ_TBL_PRODUCT_NO.nextval, '${name}', '${introduction}', ${price}, ${maxQuantity}, '${status}', '${size}')
SELECT SEQ_TBL_PRODUCT_NO.currval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_PRJ_PRODUCT_LIST TPPL (TPPL.NO, TPPL.REF_PRJ_NO, TPPL.REF_PRODUCT_NO) VALUES (SEQ_TBL_PRJ_PRODUCT_LIST_NO.nextval,#{projectNo},#{productNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_PRODUCT TP SET TP.NAME = '${name}', TP.INTRODUCTION = '${introduction}', TP.PRICE = ${price}, TP.MAX_QUANTITY =${maxQuantity}, TP.STATUS = '${status}', TP.PRODUCT_SIZE ='${size}' WHERE TP.NO = ${no}
mapper.select: SELECT TP.NO AS TBL_PRODUCT_NO, TP.NAME AS TBL_PRODUCT_NAME, TP.INTRODUCTION AS TBL_PRODUCT_INTRODUCTION, TP.PRICE AS TBL_PRODUCT_PRICE, TP.MAX_QUANTITY AS TBL_PRODUCT_MAX_QUANTITY, TP.STATUS AS TBL_PRODUCT_STATUS, TP.PRODUCT_SIZE AS TBL_PRODUCT_PRODUCT_SIZE FROM TBL_PRODUCT TP WHERE TP.NO = ${projectNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PRJ_FILE TPF (TPF.NO, TPF.TYPE, TPF.ORIGIN_NAME, TPF.CHANGE_NAME, TPF.REGIST_DATE,TPF.DELETE_YN, REF_PRJ_NO) VALUES (SEQ_TBL_PRJ_FILE_NO.nextval, '${fileType}', '${originFile}', '${savedFile}',SYSDATE, '${deleteYN}', ${projectNo})
mapper.select: SELECT TPF.TYPE AS TBL_PRJ_FILE_TYPE, TPF.ORIGIN_NAME AS TBL_PRJ_FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, TPF.CHANGE_NAME AS TBL_PRJ_FILE_CHANGE_NAME FROM TBL_PRJ_FILE TPF WHERE TPF.REF_PRJ_NO = '${projectNo}' AND TPF.DELETE_YN ='N' AND TPF.CHANGE_NAME = '${saveFileName}'

SELECT TPF.NO AS TBL_PRJ_FAQ_NO, TPF.REF_PRJ_NO AS TBL_PRJ_FAQ_REF_PRJ_NO, TPF.TITLE AS TBL_PRJ_FAQ_TITLE, TPF.CONTENT AS TBL_PRJ_FAQ_CONTENT, TPF.REGIST_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_FAQ_REGIST_DATE FROM TBL_PRJ_FAQ TPF WHERE TPF.REF_PRJ_NO = #{projectNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PRJ_FAQ TPF (TPF.NO, TPF.REF_PRJ_NO, TPF.TITLE, TPF.CONTENT, TPF.REGIST_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_TBL_PRJ_FAQ_NO.nextval, #{projectRefNo}, #{projectFaq.title}, #{projectFaq.content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT TPNI.NO AS TBL_PRJ_NEW_INFO_NO, TPNI.TITLE AS TBL_PRJ_NEW_INFO_TITLE, TPNI.CONTENT AS TBL_PRJ_NEW_INFO_CONTENT, TPNI.REGIST_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_NEW_INFO_REGIST_DATE, TPNI.MODIFY_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_NEW_INFO_MODIFY_DATE FROM TBL_PRJ_NEW_INFO TPNI WHERE REF_PRJ_NO = #{projectNo} AND DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY TPNI.NO DESC

SELECT TPNI.NO AS TBL_PRJ_NEW_INFO_NO, TPNI.TITLE AS TBL_PRJ_NEW_INFO_TITLE, TPNI.CONTENT AS TBL_PRJ_NEW_INFO_CONTENT, TPNI.REGIST_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_NEW_INFO_REGIST_DATE, TPNI.MODIFY_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_NEW_INFO_MODIFY_DATE FROM TBL_PRJ_NEW_INFO TPNI WHERE TPNI.NO = #{no} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PRJ_NEW_INFO TPNI (TPNI.NO, TPNI.TITLE, TPNI.CONTENT, TPNI.REGIST_DATE, TPNI.MODIFY_DATE, TPNI.DELETE_YN, TPNI.REF_PRJ_NO) VALUES (SEQ_TBL_PRJ_NEW_INFO_NO.nextval, #{projectNews.title},#{projectNews.content:CLOB}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'N', #{projectNo})
